SetOne.question: You believe you should always show respect to your parents and to older people. It is important to you to be obedient.
Religious belief is important to you. You want your faith or family traditions to guide your decisions and be a core part of your life.
It’s very important to you to help the people around you. You want to care for their well-being.
You think it is important that every person in the world be treated equally. You believe everyone should have equal opportunities in life.
You think it’s important to be interested in things. You like to be curious and to try to understand all sorts of things.
You like to take risks. You are always looking for adventures.
You seek every chance you can to have fun. It is important to you to do things that give you pleasure.
Getting ahead in life is important to you. You strive to do better than others.
You always want to be the one who makes the decisions. You like to be the leader.
Having a stable government is important to you. You are concerned that the social order is protected.

SetTwo.question: It is important to you to always behave properly. You want to avoid doing anything people would say is wrong.
You think it is best to do things in traditional ways. It is important to you to do things the way you were taught to do them.
It is important to you to respond to the needs of others. You try to support those you know.
You believe all the worlds’ people should live in harmony. Promoting peace among all groups in the world is important to you.
Thinking up new ideas and being creative is important to you. You like to do things in your own original way.
You think it is important to do lots of different things in life. You always looks for new things to try.
You really want to enjoy life. Having a good time is very important to you.
Being very successful is important to you. You like to impress other people.
It is important to you to be in charge and tell others what to do. You want people to do what you say.
It is important to you that things be organized and clean. You really do not like things to be a mess.

Directions: Here we briefly describe statements about you. Please read each description and think about how much that statement is or is not like you.
